items.preText: 2.17pm We're back for the reply. Mortaza has the ball. Two slips in place.
items.text: short and wide from Mortaza, slapped to cover from the crease by Gunathilaka
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: good length delivery outside off, 123 kph, defended into the off side with the full face
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: full around off, 122 kph, pushed away into the mid-off region. Nice full face of the bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: a half stop from the mid-off fielder, they'll get two, Short and wide from Mortaza, flat-batted to mid-off's left, Tamim chases after it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, 2 runs

items.text: good length around off, blocked. But Mortaza has overstepped, that's untidy. A free hit. Good call from the umpire, marginally over, but over
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, 1 no ball

items.text: 127 kph, wide called, pushes that wider, looking to sneak that under the tramline but it's called
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, 1 wide

items.preText: janaka kumara: "they may get a bonus, but it has no value. Just a win would quality Sri Lanka to the final."
items.text: smashed for four. A low full toss outside off, Gunathilaka backs away, makes some room and crashes it through mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

items.text: short on middle and leg, Gunathilaka gets underneath the length and pulls, over square leg, for four. Too easy. A very untidy day for Mortaza
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length delivery on middle and leg, nudged into the leg side
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: a good short delivery, around off, Tharanga bails out of a pull rather late
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: well bowled, hits a back of a length outside off, the ball pops away off the shoulder of the bat to third man for a run
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: strays down leg, 127 kph, nudged towards a short fine leg fielder
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: a slower delivery outside off, tapped towards point for one
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: back of a length delivery, 127 kph, another quiet tap into the point region for a run
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: too straight from Mortaza, worked away into the gap at midwicket for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: too straight again, just a simple clip through square leg for a run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: nicely bowled, tight around off, defended into the off side, towards cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: a good length delivery outside off, a thick outside edge down to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: another slower delivery down leg, nudged to square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: yet another slower delivery down leg, nudged down to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gunathilaka, no run

items.text: short and wide, slashed down to third man for a run
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: good length around off, Gunathilaka hangs back and swats it back from where it came, right over the bowler's head. Fantastic hit
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

items.text: fullish length outside off, hit into the leg side
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Gunathilaka, 1 run

items.text: a short delivery that is well down leg, another wide
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run

items.text: nicely bowled, 129 kph outside off, on a length and moving away, Tharanga hangs his bat out and gets beaten on the outside edge
items.shortText: Abul Hasan to Tharanga, no run
